name: DurPack® Non-Cross Linked Polyethylene Foam
description: DurPack® Non-Cross Linked Polyethylene Foam has straight bond structure and it is produced with extrusion method with chemicals and inflator gas addition. Compared to our cross-linked polyethylene foam product DurProx and DurSolex, DurPack (Non-cross Linked Polyethylene Foam) has straight bond structure and it is produced with extrusion method with chemicals and inflator gas addition. Compared to our cross-linked polyethylene foam product DurProx and DurSolex, DurPack is more economical and is mostly used in the application areas where the standards are not as demanding. DurPack is used for sound, heat and humidity insulation and shock protection. DurPack is more economical and is mostly used in the application areas where the standards are not as demanding.
